paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: An example is case 12 who had a deletion resulting in a frameshift mutation (G749Afs*8). Six family members were found to have the same mutation with four having definite abnormal cardiac investigations.

functional_data.summary: The deletion results in a frameshift mutation.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in family members.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was found in multiple family members, indicating potential familial inheritance.
key_quotes: An example is case 12 who had a deletion resulting in a frameshift mutation (G749Afs*8). Six family members were found to have the same mutation with four having definite abnormal cardiac investigations.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted successfully.
